radiographic_examinations.findings: Lymphadenopathy in mediastinum, bilateral neck, axillary area, enterocoelia, retroperitoneal and pelvic cavity, splenomegaly, and partial thickening in the small intestine.
Thickening in the small intestinal wall, together with multiple lymphadenopathies in the abdominal cavity and retroperitoneum.
Three polyps with sizes of 0.8 cm, 0.7 cm, and 0.4 cm, respectively, diagnosed as tubular adenoma with low-grade dysplasia.
